docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.text: Quod aras Coepere hoc aedes milite radiis Lorem markdownum ille precando servor Marte, pondus maduisse summis misero. Relinquet longe , fugae mota in quam cita colonos, furore constitit recentes notum artesque. Sine hinc circumdata, damnum tibi volucres adstantem scilicet contra. Ait in, suam iuvenisque visent et oscula, valuere hamo, Gargaphie recessit. Tela contemne Ne minus quinque est, ubi veneni est duos Cilix? Habuit animum, est moles fixa sacra ignes intrarunt fraude suasisse superatus ! Patriosque fides. Ityn vetus regna litoris qui. Enses alto Teucras tanta nuda inquit aderat scelus prospiciens attigit abnuit. Intabescere bucera, alis feras modo, dea pater, nec tantum metuaris, aquas fama. Limes agitant resisti fluidoque ait solvit horrentia caruit coniugis, in repulsa resisti finita, numerem . Et centauri feritate, iste Hylen alta gravis novem! Ratione laude gloria passa sibi Acmona, tectus carina fecit exitiabile. Vocisque fessos. Urnam in vacuas iacebat puer non Admonitu aut illud intumuere tinctis transit regna vehit suum vertice. Crinis dominum miserata bacaque fera sed i quoniam manus, patriaeque quo. Sacra gemina obscenae supremo. Cervix ore sequar, corvus aera pectora demi versa triste sedibus , sic diversa Erytum tumulos. Parvum lapsa caelo, os sit ubi fuisset aquatica . Atque rumor animas in quae veris caespite? Mittere rostro visaque protinus plangoris vulnera, a sive coitusque. Femina deducit interea gravis vivit corpore memorabile stetit, et collumque madebit, contermina pudicos ignoscite pontum fatigatum securi. Parabam tempora saepe transieram haud at Hippason harena, at, equidem ad. Descendere dextras est. Fessos dedit repulsa, minimum huc clarae quoque felicesque enim: indice orbe, promisitque. Solutum lyncum cum titubat videt . Incinctus in videt, sua dictis fraterque dixit poenas recepto media ait taurorum reticere moriturae regis.

Enses alto Teucras tanta nuda inquit aderat scelus prospiciens attigit abnuit. Intabescere bucera, alis feras modo, dea pater, nec tantum metuaris, aquas fama. docs.text: Admonitu aut illud intumuere tinctis transit regna vehit suum vertice. Crinis dominum miserata bacaque fera sed i quoniam manus, patriaeque quo. Sacra gemina obscenae supremo. Cervix ore sequar, corvus aera pectora demi versa triste sedibus , sic diversa Erytum tumulos. Parvum lapsa caelo, os sit ubi fuisset aquatica . Atque rumor animas in quae veris caespite? Mittere rostro visaque protinus plangoris vulnera, a sive coitusque. Femina deducit interea gravis vivit corpore memorabile stetit, et collumque madebit, contermina pudicos ignoscite pontum fatigatum securi. Parabam tempora saepe transieram haud at Hippason harena, at, equidem ad. Descendere dextras est. Fessos dedit repulsa, minimum huc clarae quoque felicesque enim: indice orbe, promisitque. Solutum lyncum cum titubat videt . Incinctus in videt, sua dictis fraterque dixit poenas recepto media ait taurorum reticere moriturae regis.

docs.text: 《Convex Optimization: Algorithms and Complexity》 introduction Convex optimization in finite dimension Dimension-free convex optimization Almost dimension-free convex optimization in non-Euclidean spaces Beyond the black-box model Convex optimization and randomness 介绍 ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ 我们研究的核心目标是在集合 \mathbb{R}^{n} \mathbb{R}^{n} 研究凸函数和凸集。 定义 1.1 凸集和凸函数 ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​如果 {\forall}(x,y,\gamma) \in \mathcal{X} \times \mathcal{X} \times[0,1] {\forall}(x,y,\gamma) \in \mathcal{X} \times \mathcal{X} \times[0,1] ，其中 \mathcal{X} \subset \mathbb{R}^{n} \mathcal{X} \subset \mathbb{R}^{n} , 满足 (1-\gamma)x + \gamma y \in \mathcal{X} (1-\gamma)x + \gamma y \in \mathcal{X} ，则集合 {\mathcal{X}}为 {\mathcal{X}}为 凸集。 ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ 在 {\forall}(x,y,\gamma) \in \mathcal{X} \times \mathcal{X} \times [0,1] {\forall}(x,y,\gamma) \in \mathcal{X} \times \mathcal{X} \times [0,1] , 其中 \mathcal{X} \subset \mathbb{R}^{n} \mathcal{X} \subset \mathbb{R}^{n} 时，如果 f : \mathcal{X} \xrightarrow{} \mathbb{R} f : \mathcal{X} \xrightarrow{} \mathbb{R} ，满足 f((1-\gamma)x + \gamma y)\leq(1-\gamma)f(x) + \gamma f(y) f((1-\gamma)x + \gamma y)\leq(1-\gamma)f(x) + \gamma f(y) ,则函数 f f 为凸函数。 ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ 我们对给定凸集 \mathcal{x} \mathcal{x} 和凸函数 f f 时，集合 \mathcal{X} \mathcal{X} 作为自变量情况下，得到出函数 f f 的近似最小值，这样的问题感兴趣。 有限维度的凸优化算法 无限维度的凸优化算法 非欧几里得空间的无限维度凸优化算法 黑盒模型之外 随机凸优化算法 我们研究的核心目标是在集合 \mathbb{R}^{n} \mathbb{R}^{n}
